movie.title: Reach for the Sky
movie.plot: The true story of airman Douglas Bader who overcame the loss of both legs in a 1931 flying accident to become a successful fighter pilot and wing leader during World War II.
movie.awards: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 4 nominations.

events.title: Douglas Bader is shot down over France and captured
Douglas Bader flies over London to celebrate the anniversary of the Battle of Britain
